text: Leland E. Byrd (April 8, 1927 - January 19, 2022) was an American college athletic administrator, basketball player and coach. He was an All-American player at West Virginia University (WVU). He later became an athletic director at many universities in the United States, even WVU. Byrd was born in Lynch, Kentucky. He was raised in Matoaka, West Virginia. His playing career lasted from 1944 until 1948. He coached Glenville State Pioneers between 1955 until 1966. Byrd died on January 19, 2022 in Morgantown, West Virginia at the age of 94.Former WVU Director of Athletics Leland Byrd Passes Away ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Kentucky Category:Sportspeople from West Virginia
title: Leland Byrd
